articles.title: SEA Games in Vietnam postponed amid rising COVID-19 cases - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: This year's Southeast Asian Games due to take place in Vietnam has been postponed to 2022.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: This year's Southeast Asian Games due to take place in Vietnam has been postponed to 2022.

articles.author: Maxine Koh
articles.title: Actress Beatrice Chien dies at 81, she had roles in Ramen Teh and Crazy Rich Asians - CNA
articles.description: Chien only began her career as a freelance actress at the age of 62, after a 40-year career in nursing.

articles.author: Robin Millard with AFP bureaus
articles.title: World passes 4 million COVID deaths as Asia battles fresh outbreaks - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: GENEVA, Switzerland - More than four million people have now died from Covid-19, the World Health Organization said on Wednesday, as many rich nations prepare to loosen restrictions even as countries in Asia battle surging infections.
